name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course prepares first-year graduate students for future research in their respective disciplines. Students are expected to critically examine scholarly papers of their choice as they develop ideas of their own research. Through in-class paper presentations and discussions, they will get to exchange ideas and thus learn from different perspectives. Active participation of all members is strongly encouraged.
schedule:
Week 1    Introduction    
Week 3    Paper Presentation (Part I)     
Week 5    Paper Presentation (Part I)    
Week 7    Paper Presentation (Part I)    
Week 9    Paper Presentation (Part I)   
Week 11   Paper Presentation (Part II)
Week 13   Paper Presentation (Part II)
Week 15   Paper Presentation (Part II)
Week 17   Paper Presentation (Part II)


Note: Class meets every other week for 9 times in Fall 2009. Each session starts from 1:10 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday and allows four paper presentations.
